body.p: Mr Beriah Mcgoffin Govner of Kentucky

To your Excellency we Petition you to releace Benjamin Burton of a fine of $15,00 that went against him before W,, H,, Logan a justice of the Peace for Pulaski County on the 6th day of December last for rioting wherin the commonwealth was Plaintiff & the said Banjamin Burton Defendant
Mr B was find for striking, first, cause his adversary charged him openly & publicly with bribery & Burton struck. the insult was outrageous

E L VanWinkle
Sherrod Williams
E L VanWinkle
W McKee Fox
Frank. J. White
S. F. Tomlinson J I Allcorn
Thomas Girdler M Singleton
Woods Denton
M. Oppenheimer
N. Buchanan
S M Hail
J. E. Cosson
O. G. Kelly
John, M, Newman
John Owens
A.. G.. Wood
H. S.
A S Allron
J. B. Girdler
This day personally appeared Benjamin Burton before me and made oath that the statements in the within petition are true to the best of his knowledge and belief this April the 2nd 1861

Pulaski J. P.
$15. } Breach
Benj Burton
Issd Apr. 9. 1861
